div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 802 Thrace, c. 1960 Burial: 4th cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 1000-6000 AE Abdera: 4 Maroneia: 662 (as SNGCop. 628 ff.) Disposition: Athens 666 as listed. Franke estimates that another 5000 of Ma- roneia were dispersed Varoucha, BCH 1962, p. 421, illus. (2); A Delt 19 (1964), Chronika, p. 8
